name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes with syrup, butter, and fresh fruits, served warm for a delightful morning treat.

name: Omelette
description: Delicious omelette with veggies, cheese, and herbs, providing a protein-packed start to your day.

name: French Toast
description: Golden brown French toast with syrup, powdered sugar, cinnamon, and a side of fresh berries.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Toasted bread with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese, and sprinkled with chili flakes and lemon.

name: Smoothie Bowl
description: A healthy smoothie bowl with banana, granola, nuts, berries, chia seeds, and coconut flakes topping.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: Fresh lettuce, grilled chicken, tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, cheese, and a light balsamic dressing drizzle.

name: Club Sandwich
description: Triple-layered sandwich with turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, cheese, mayo, served with crispy potato chips.

name: Pasta Alfredo
description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with parmesan cheese, garlic, butter, and tender grilled chicken pieces added.

name: Sushi Platter
description: An assortment of sushi rolls, sashimi, soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi for dipping.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy cheeseburger with lettuce, tomato, pickles, cheddar cheese, onion rings, and a side of fries.

name: Strawberry Shake
description: Creamy strawberry milkshake made with fresh strawberries, ice cream, whipped cream, and a cherry topping.

name: Chocolate Shake
description: Rich chocolate milkshake with chocolate syrup, cocoa powder, ice cream, and topped with whipped cream.

name: Banana Smoothie
description: A nutritious banana smoothie with yogurt, honey, cinnamon, vanilla, and blended to smooth perfection.

name: Vanilla Shake
description: Classic vanilla milkshake with vanilla bean ice cream, whole milk, sugar, and whipped cream topping.

name: Oreo Shake
description: Delicious Oreo milkshake blended with cookies, ice cream, milk, and drizzled with chocolate syrup.

name: Egg Benedict
description: Poached eggs on an English muffin with hollandaise sauce, ham, and a parsley garnish.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, parmesan cheese, grilled chicken, and fresh lemon zest.

name: Tacos
description: Soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned beef, shredded lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.

name: Mango Lassi
description: Refreshing mango yogurt drink blended with sugar, cardamom, ice cubes, and a mint garnish.

name: Blueberry Shake
description: Fresh blueberry shake blended with milk, honey, vanilla extract, and topped with whipped cream.
